title: NCLT Hyderabad initiates insolvency proceedings against GVK Gautami Power
description: "NCLT, Hyderabad bench, during its hearing on October 20 initiated insolvency proceedings under The lnsolvency and Bankruptcy Code, 2016 filed by the Edelweiss Asset Reconstruction Company (EARC) against GVK Gautami Power Ltd, a step down subsidiary of the company," it said.
